title: Money, Money, Money
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 2,635 words, Level Z2 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1100L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in level                     X		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     X and Z1		                 
		Multilevel Book also available in level                     X
description: Have you ever wondered where money comes from or who decides its value? Money, Money, Money provides students with an informative look at the development of money. The book can also be used to teach students how to identify main idea and details and use proper nouns correctly. ￼The books and lesson are available for levels X and Z1.
highFrequencyWords: barter, bullion, circulation, coinage, counterfeit, currency, denomination, dichroic, encoded, fiat money, hyperinflation, incised, intrinsically, malleable, mint, mutilated, oxidizes, viable
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Proper Nouns                : Identify and use proper nouns
awareness: Compound Words                : Identify and understand hyphenated compound adjectives
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
